level.heading: Transition.
level.text: For a period of 2 years following March 6, 2007, all references in this chapter to surgical assistants shall be deemed to refer to persons meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether they are licensed in fact.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Licensing of health professionals, general qualifications of applicants, see ยง 3-1205.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-228
level.text: For Law 16-228, see notes following ยง 3-1206.41.
